name: Life and Death
description:
Controls:

On PC: Use W, A, S, D or the Arrow Keys to move.

On Mobile:  Drag and release in a direction to move.

Details:

Life and Death is my first attempt at making both a videogame and music. Life and Death was made using Bitsy Game Maker which helped keep the scope small. The music was made using the DefleMask Tracker. Life and Death may not be suitable for people suffering from depression or anxiety or for children. Player discretion is advised.
